name: Forget the Lonely Planet! Get to know the real Lisbon
description: It's not jus a trip. It's an experience. If you are the type of person that arrives at a new city and looks for the local places, talks to the people there, tries to emerge in the culture, well, I can offer you that plus some really cool, easy going new friends. And If you like to eat, oh my god, prepare yourself, you have arrived to the right place. Name what you want and you will have the best of it here. You know portuguese cuisine os one of the most rich, interesting in the world. It really is! Lets go!
